sentences.sentence: He spent his time devising incomprehensible mathematics puzzles.
sentences.translation: 他把时间花在设计难以破解的数学难题上。

sentences.sentence: Isaac Asimov evaded the whole notion of morality in devising his three laws of robotics.
sentences.translation: 艾萨克·阿西莫夫在设计他的机器人三定律时，避开了整个道德概念。

sentences.sentence: Researchers in Australia have been devising and testing a method of trickery to make lions think they are being watched by the painted eyes on cow butts.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚的研究人员一直在设计并测试一种能骗过狮子的方法，即在牛屁股上画眼睛，让狮子以为自己正被猎物注视着。
